action.js: tm.newTask({path: '/easyflow/diagram-graphics-edit', title: mem.name, data: {deployment: {data: context.targetXmlText}, isModified: true, loaded: true,}})

onSaveTokenVar.js: return backend.post('/aoa/execObjectMethod', {object: 'easyflow', method: 'saveTokenVar', params: {tokenId: mem.id, name: params.name, value: params.value}})
return backend.post('/aoa/execObjectMethod', {object: 'easyflow', method: 'saveTokenVar', params: {tokenId: mem.process_id, name: params.name, value: params.value}})

action.js: frontend.dialog({object:'easyflow', form: 'modifyInitiatorDialog', mem: {tokenId: mem.id, oldInitiator: mem.initiator, initiator: mem.initiator }});

onRowDoubleClicked.js: tm.newTask({path: '/aoa/ObjectListTask', title: `${_('Process')} ${params.selectedRow.id}`, params: {object: 'easyflow', list: 'processManager', token_id: params.selectedRow.id}});

onChangeInitiator.js: return backend.post('/aoa/execObjectMethod', {object: 'easyflow', method: 'changeProcessInitiator', params: {'tokenId': params.tokenId, 'oldInitiator': params.oldInitiator, 'initiator': params.initiator}});

onRowDoubleClicked.js: frontend.dialog({object: 'easyflow', form: 'modifyTokenVarDialog', mem: {name: context.vctx.selectedRow.name, value: context.vctx.selectedRow.value}})

addCandidate.js: context.selectedCandidate = null; mem.candidates.push({user: null, group: null});mem.candidates = [...mem.candidates];

action.js: return backend.post('/aoa/execObjectMethod', {object: 'easyflow', method: 'saveCandidates', params: {tokenId: mem.id, candidates:mem.candidates}})
let e = {id: uuidv4(), name: 'new event'}; mem.$events.push(e); mem.events.push(e.name); mem.$events.modified();

@notify.$$: mem.notify.reduce((a, n, i)=>{a['@notify_'+i]={object: 'easyflow', form: 'editLaneNotifyForm', params: {notify$: 'mem.notify['+i+']'}}; return a}, {})

action.js: backend.post('/aoa/execObjectMethod', {object: 'easyflow', method: 'saveDiagram', params: {id: mem.diagram.id, modified: mem.diagram.modified, data: mem.xml}}).then((r)=>{mem.diagram.modified=r.modified; context.modified=false; forceUpdate();})

onTaskCreated.js: return backend.post('/aoa/execObjectMethod', {object: 'easyflow', method: 'getDiagram', params: {id: task.params.id}}).then((r)=>{mem.diagram = r;})

action.js: backend.post('/aoa/execObjectMethod', {object: 'easyflow', method: 'saveDiagramAuthority', params: {authorityId: mem.authority.id, deploymentId: mem.authority.deploymentId, modified: mem.authority.modified, data: mem.xml}}).then((r)=>{mem.authority.modified=r.modified; context.modified=false; mem.authority.id=r; forceUpdate();})

.buttons.$$: task.params.actions.reduce((a, v)=>{a['.btn'+v.value]={label: v.name, control: 'Button', action: {name: 'onButtonAction', params: {action: v.value, name: v.name}}}; return a;}, {})
task.params?.actions?.reduce?.((a, v)=>{a['.btn'+v.value]={label: v.label, control: 'Button', action: {name: 'onButtonAction', params: {action: v.value, label: v.label}}}; return a;}, {})

script.py:
#
#       
#
from beflex.easyflow.models import Token, TokenAut
from django.conf import settings
from django.db import transaction

p = parameters['token']
oldUser = parameters['oldUser']
newUser = parameters['newUser']

with transaction.atomic(using=settings.APPS_DB['easyflow']):
    #   ,      
    #    
    if p.initiator == oldUser:
        p.initiator = newUser
        p.save()
    
    #    
    for t in p.tokens.filter(state__in=['active', 'suspended']):
        needSave = False
        
        #  
        if t.initiator == oldUser:
            t.initiator = newUser
            needSave = True
        
        #  
        if t.performer == oldUser:
            t.performer = newUser
            needSave = True
        
        if needSave:
            t.save()
        
        #  
        if t.flow.typ == 'task':
            #  
            if t.candidates.filter(username = oldUser).count() > 0:
                if t.candidates.filter(username=newUser).count() == 0:
                    ta = TokenAut(
                        token = t,
                        username = newUser
                    )
                    ta.save()

from beflex.easyflow.models import Deployment

w = Deployment.objects.get(id=parameters['id'])
w.authority.delete()
w.delete()

#raise UserException(json.dumps(parameters, indent=4))

from beflex.easyflow.models import TokenVar
import base64
from django.http import HttpResponse
import urllib



#raise UserException(json.dumps(parameters, indent=4))

tv = TokenVar.objects.get(
    token_id=parameters['tokenId'], 
    name=parameters['attribute'],
)

attributeData = base64.b64decode(tv.value)

#
#   
#
data = HttpResponse(
    attributeData,
    content_type=parameters['content-type']
)
data["Content-Disposition"] = 'Content-Disposition: inline; filename="{filename}"'.format(
    filename = parameters['filename'],
)
data["Content-Length"] = len(attributeData)

from beflex.aoa.services import applyFilterModel2
from beflex.easyflow.models import Token

query = Token.objects.filter(type='timer', state='active')

filterModel2 = parameters['request'].get('filterModel2') if parameters.get('request') else None
    
if filterModel2:
    if 'errorsOnly' in filterModel2:
        if filterModel2['errorsOnly'] == True:
            query = query.filter(task_state='error')
        del filterModel2['errorsOnly']
    query = applyFilterModel2(query, filterModel2)
else:
    query = query.all()


if parameters.get('request', {}).get('startRow') is not None:
    query = query[parameters['request']['startRow']:parameters['request']['endRow']]


data = []
for t in query:
    data.append({
        'id': t.id.__str__(),
        'state': t.state,
        'task_state': t.task_state,
        'created': t.created,
        'initiator': t.initiator,
        'started': t.started,
        'scheduled': t.scheduled,
        'wait_time': t.scheduled - t.started if t.started and t.scheduled else None,
        'description': t.description,
        'workflow_id': t.process.flow_id, 
    })

from beflex.easyflow.models import Token

t = Token.objects.get(id=parameters.get('id'))

objectKey = t.objectKey or t.processToken.objectKey or t.getTopProcess().objectKey
if not objectKey:
    objectKey = t.process.vars_dict.get('objectKey')

if t.process_id is not None:
    #  ,   
    children = [{'id': c.id.__str__(),'deployment_code': c.deployment.code,'deployment_name' : c.deployment.name} for c in t.children.all()]
else:
    #     
    children = None

data = {
    'id': t.id.__str__(),
    'parent_id': t.parent_id.__str__(),
    'deployment_id': t.deployment_id.__str__(),
    'process_id': t.processToken.id.__str__(),
    'flow_id': t.flow_id.__str__(),
    'type': t.type,
    'deployment_code': t.deployment.code if t.deployment else '',
    'flow_name': t.flow.name if t.flow else '',
    'state': t.state,
    'task_state': t.task_state,
    'created': t.created,
    'scheduled': t.scheduled,
    'initiator': t.initiator,
    'performer': t.performer,
    'started': t.started,
    'completed': t.completed,
    'description': t.description,

    
    'processVars': t.processToken.vars_dict,
    'tokenVars': t.vars_dict,
    
    'objectKey': objectKey,
    'candidates': [{'user': x.username, 'group': x.groupname} for x in t.candidates.all()],
    'children': children
}

from beflex.easyflow.models import TokenVar

tv = TokenVar.objects.get(token_id=parameters['tokenId'], name=parameters['name'])

tv.value = json.dumps(parameters['value'])
tv.save()

from beflex.easyflow.services import RuntimeService as rs

os = rs.getStateByObjectKey(parameters['objectKey'])
oj = rs.getJournalByObjectKey(parameters['objectKey'])

data = []

for r in os:
    d = {
        'token_id': r.id.__str__(),
        'type': r.type,
        'state': r.state,
        'task_state': r.task_state,
        'initiator': r.initiator,
        'performer': r.performer,
        'candidate': '',
        'created': r.created,
        'started': r.started,
        'scheduled': r.scheduled,
        'description': r.description,
        'isIdle': r.isIdle,
    }
    if d['performer'] is None:
        candidates = r.candidates.all()
        d['candidate'] = ', '.join([c.username or c.groupname for c in candidates if c.username is not None or c.groupname is not None])
    
    if d['task_state'] == 'error':
        d['token_error'] = r.vars_dict.get('error')
    
    data.append(d)
    
from django.db.models import prefetch_related_objects
prefetch_related_objects(oj, 'token')

for r in oj:
    d = {
        'token_id': r.token_id.__str__(),
        'type': r.token.flow.typ if r.token.flow else None,
        'state': None,
        'task_state': None,
        'initiator': None,
        'performer': r.performer,
        'candidate': '',
        'created': r.created,
        'started': None,
        'scheduled': None,
        'description': r.description,
    }
    data.append(d)

from beflex.easyflow.models import Token, TokenAut
from django.conf import settings
from django.db import transaction

#print('saveCandidates  start')

if not parameters.get('tokenId'):
    raise Exception('  ')

#  
with transaction.atomic(using=settings.APPS_DB['easyflow']):
    candidates = TokenAut.objects.filter(token_id = parameters.get('tokenId'))
    candidates.delete()
    
    for candidate in parameters.get('candidates'):
        c = TokenAut()
        c.token_id = parameters.get('tokenId')
        c.username = candidate.get('user')
        c.groupname = candidate.get('group')
        c.save()

from beflex.easyflow.services import RuntimeService as rs
rs.stopToken(parameters.get('tokenId'))

from beflex.easyflow.models import Token, TokenAut
from django.conf import settings
from django.db import transaction

t = Token.objects.get(id=parameters.get('tokenId'))

oldInitiator = parameters['oldInitiator']
initiator = parameters['initiator']

if oldInitiator != initiator:
    with transaction.atomic(using=settings.APPS_DB['easyflow']):
    #   
        if t.initiator == oldInitiator:
            t.initiator = initiator
            t.save()

"""
  Delete all processes by workflow
  Parameters:
    code - workflow code
    raiseOnError - stop on errro
"""
from beflex.easyflow.models import Token
from beflex.easyflow.services import RuntimeService as rs
from django.db import transaction
from django.conf import settings
import logging

logger = logging.getLogger('easyflow')

if not parameters.get('code'):
    raise Exception('Invalid argument: code')

logger.debug('start delete processes for %s', parameters['code'])

processes = Token.objects.filter(deployment__code=parameters['code'], process_id=None)
for p in processes:
    try:
        with transaction.atomic(using=settings.APPS_DB['easyflow']):
            rs.deleteProcessById(p.id)
            logger.debug('process %s deleted', p.id)
    except Exception as e:
        logger.error('Error delete token %s\n%s', p.id, e)
        if parameters.get('raiseOnError'):
            raise

logger.debug('processes for %s deleted', parameters['code'])

token_id = parameters['tokenId']
vars = parameters['vars']

from beflex.easyflow.models import Token
t = Token.objects.get(id=token_id)
t.save_vars(vars)

from beflex.easyflow.services import DeploymentService as ds

diagram = ds.getDeploymentById(parameters['id'])

data = {
    'id': diagram.id,
    'name': diagram.flow.name,
    'data': diagram.data,
    'modified': diagram.modified
}

from beflex.easyflow.models import Token
import uuid

def isUUID(s):
    try:
        u = uuid.UUID(s)
        return True
    except:
        return False

def makeResponse(rows):
    response = []
    for r in rows:
        row = {
            'id'            : r.id,
            'name'          : r.description if r.description else r.flow.name if r.flow else r.flow_id,
            'process_id'    : r.process_id,
            'deployment_id' : r.deployment_id.__str__(),
            'parent_id'     : r.parent_id if r.process_id is None else None,
            'flow_id'       : r.flow.id if r.flow else r.flow_id,
            'flowType'      : r.flow.typ if r.flow else None,
            'initiator'     : r.initiator,
            'performer'     : r.performer,
            'created'       : r.created,
            'completed'     : r.completed,
            'state'         : r.state,
            'taskState'     : r.task_state,
            'objectKey'     : r.objectKey
        }
        response.append(row)
        
    return response
        
query = Token.objects

if parameters.get('id'):
    query = query.filter(id=parameters['id'])
elif parameters.get('request', {}).get('filterModel2', {}).get('token_id'):
    if not isUUID(parameters['request']['filterModel2']['token_id']):
        raise UserException('   UUID')
        
    query = query.filter(id=parameters['request']['filterModel2']['token_id'])
    query = query.union(Token.objects.filter(process_id=parameters['request']['filterModel2']['token_id']))
    query = query.order_by('-process_id', '-created')
else:
    raise UserException('  ')
    
if parameters.get('request', {}).get('startRow') is not None:
    query = query[parameters['request']['startRow']:parameters['request']['endRow']]
    

data = makeResponse(query)

def saveAuthority(authority_id, deployment_id, xml):
    from beflex.easyflow.models import Authority
    if authority_id:
        authority = Authority.objects.get(id=authority_id)
        authority.data = xml
    else:
        authority = Authority(
            deployment_id = deployment_id,
            data=xml
        )
        
    authority.save()
    
    return authority

a = saveAuthority(parameters.get('authorityId'), parameters['deploymentId'], parameters['data'])

data = a.id.__str__()

from beflex.easyflow.services import RuntimeService as rs

candidates = rs.getTaskCandidates(parameters['token_id'])


#users = [c.username for c in candidates if c.username]
#groups = [c.groupname for c in candidates if c.groupname]

data = [{
    'code': x.username
} for x in candidates if x.username is not None]

from beflex.easyflow.services import RuntimeService as rs
from beflex.easyflow.models import Token
from django.db import transaction
from django.conf import settings

if parameters['tokenId'] is None:
    raise UserException('Argument error: tokenId')

if parameters['code'] is None:
    raise UserException('Argument error: code')

with transaction.atomic(using=settings.APPS_DB['easyflow']):
    parent_token = Token.objects.get(id=parameters['tokenId'])
    params = parameters.get('params', {})
    if 'objectKey' not in params and parent_token.process.objectKey is not None:
        params['objectKey'] = parent_token.process.objectKey
    process_token = rs.createProcessByCode(parameters['code'], params)
    process_token.parent_id = parameters['tokenId']
    process_token.enter()

data = {
    'tokenId': process_token.id.__str__()
}

# Check if parallel tokens completed

def _(s):
    return s

own_flow_token = parameters['token']
root_token = own_flow_token.parent

parallel_tokens = root_token.children.exclude(id=own_flow_token.id)

if parallel_tokens.count()>0:
    tasks = ['  - ' + (x.description or x.flow.name) for x in parallel_tokens]
    raise UserError((_('Parallel tasks must be completed first') + '\n') + '\n'.join(tasks))

from beflex.easyflow.models import Token

if parameters.get('id') is None:
    raise UserException('Invalid argument: id')
    
token = Token.objects.get(id=parameters['id'])

token.flow.behavior.evalDeadline(token)
token.save()

command.js: frontend.dialog({object: 'easyflow', form: 'createDiagramCopyDialog', mem: {}, params: {id: $listRow.id, code: $listRow.code, name: $listRow.name}, context: {}})
frontend.dialog({object: 'package', form: 'objectPackageDialog', mem: {}, params: {objectId: $listRow.id, model: 'easyflow.Deployment'}, context: {}})

setToday.jsScript: let dt = new Date(); let df = new Date(); mem.created__date__gte = df.toISOString().substring(0,10); mem.created__date__lte = dt.toISOString().substring(0,10);

setPrevMonth.jsScript: let dt = new Date(); let df = new Date(); df.setMonth(df.getMonth()-1); df.setDate(1); dt.setDate(0); mem.created__date__gte = df.toISOString().substring(0,10); mem.created__date__lte = dt.toISOString().substring(0,10);

setLastMonth.jsScript: let dt = new Date(); let df = new Date(); df.setDate(1); mem.created__date__gte = df.toISOString().substring(0,10); mem.created__date__lte = dt.toISOString().substring(0,10);

script.py: data = AO.easyflow.getList(parameters)

js.diagramGetTimer:
return {
    id:props.node.id,
    name: props.node.name,
    description: props.node.description || '',
    condition: props.node.condition || '',
    duration: props.node.duration || '00:00:00',
    errorDuration: props.node.errorDuration || '00:01:00',
    action: props.node.action || props.node.type==='timer' && 'continue' || 'fork',
    scriptBefore: props.node.scriptBefore,
    events: {...(props.node.events || {} )},
}
js.getCallFromNode:
return {
    id: params.node.id || '',
    name: params.node.name,
    call: params.node.call || '',
    condition: params.node.condition || '',
    resultFrom: params.node.resultFrom || '',
    resultTo: params.node.resultTo || '',
    parameters: params.node.parameters.map((item)=>({...item})),
    comment: params.node.comment,
    events: {beforeExecute: null, afterExecute: null, ...params.node.events},
}
js.createDefaultNotify:
return {
    active: true,
    name: 'Notify',
    condition: '',
    channel: 'EMAIL',
    subject: 'You have new task: {{task.description}}',
    message: '',
    addressExpression: '',
    candidates: true,
    writeJournal: false
};
